issue.title: Unused dependencies in arrow and datafusion
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4791](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4791). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
One unused dependency found in rust/arrow

`[dependencies]`
` bytes = "0.4"`

Another unused dependency found in rust/datafusion

`[dependencies]`
` clap = "2.31.2"`

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4791?focusedCommentId=16786312) by Paddy Horan (paddyhoran):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3826
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3826>
